title: Key Moments in Gisèle Pelicot’s Interview With The New York Times
summary_full: The woman at the center of France’s largest-ever mass-rape trial told us about her life before, during and after the abuse she suffered at the hands of her husband.
summary_public: The woman at the center of France’s largest-ever mass-rape trial told us about her life before, during and after the abuse she suffered at the hands of her husband.
